wikipedia_page.main: Philip Palmer is a British novelist and screenwriter. Originally from Port Talbot, Wales, he studied English at Jesus College, Oxford, matriculating in 1979.

Debatable Space is a 2008 science fiction novel by novelist and screenwriter Philip Palmer.
Red Claw is a 2009 science fiction novel by British writer Philip Palmer.
The Hatton Garden Heist, a radio play by Philip Palmer was broadcast on BBC Radio 4 in April 2017.
Philip Palmer is a British novelist and screenwriter.
